name: HITOP Mini Submersible Aquarium Heater - 25W 50W 100W 200W 300W Small Heater for Fish Tank 1-70 Gallon with Controller (25W)
short_description: 🐟HITOP Mini size aquarium heater 25W with controller, suitable for seawater and freshwater heating, betta fish and turtle tanks and other small fish tanks or fish bowl 1-6 gallon.
🐟Easy to operate: This fish tank heater is easy to use, 5.6Ft long cable wire and the external controller can easily set the temperature, and the temperature adjustment range is 68-93℉.

🐟Easy to read temperature: There is digital LED temperature display on the controller of this heater, which can display the set temp and real-time water temp, so that you can know the temperature changes in the fish tank easily. A clear heating indicator on the controller can help you easily monitor the working status of this mini heater.
🐟Fish-friendly: This aquarium heater is made of thickened quartz glass, and has good sealing performance to prevent water from entering, making it a more fish-friendly heater.

🐟Package: Comes with two suction cups, a bottom protective cover, and a sticker-thermometer. Please check the product carefully before using it, we provide a 12-month after-sales service for this product.

name: Hitop 25W/50W/100W/300W Adjustable Aquarium Heater, Submersible Glass Water Heater for 5 – 70 Gallon Fish Tank (50W)
short_description: Wide Application: 50W aquarium heater, length: 7.8*1*1 in (20*2.5*2.5 cm), suitable for 5-15 gallon aquariums, also suitable for seawater and freshwater, can be used in fish tanks and turtle tanks.
Safe: Explosion-proof glass heater, this fish tank heater is made of 2mm thickened quartz glass, 33% thicker than ordinary glass, not easy to crack, which is very safe for people and aquatic animals.

Adjustable Temperature: This fish heater adopts 8-slot multi-branch heating wire ceramic frame, better heat dissipation, long service life. The adjustable temperature range of the water heater for fish tank is 68°F - 93°F (20°C - 34°C), and we also included a thermometer sticker, which is more convenient to check the water temperature.

Protecting Fish Safety: Even if continuous heating is required, this aquarium heater will heat for a period of time and then pause for a few minutes (the indicator light will turn off during the pause), gradually reaching the set temperature. This design helps keep water temperature from fluctuating too much, preventing fish from feeling uncomfortable and protecting their safety.

Complete Accessories and Warranty: This aquarium submersible heater comes with all the accessories you need, except for a stick-on thermometer, it also comes with 3 suction cups, one for replacement. We provide a 12-month warranty service for this heater, so you can buy with confidence, if you have any questions, please feel free to contact us, we will reply within 24 hours.

Note: This fish tank heater must be fully submerged in water for use. If you need to change the water or clean the fish tank, please cut off the power first, cool the heater for more than 15 minutes, and then take it out after the heater is completely cooled.
product_description: 50W Aquarium Heater, 7.8 x 1 x 1 in,1.5M/4.9ft cable. This fish tank heater is simple and beautiful in appearance, placed in your aquarium, unobtrusive, and will not destroy the fish tank landscape. You and your fish will like it. We adopted 2mm thickened quartz glass, much safer for both human and animals. And this aquarium heater will turn off automatically when reaches temperature you set, without overheating.For the products, we have been keeping improving. Features:1. Good in maintain temp.2. Both suitable for freshwater and saltwater.3. Complete accessories: An extra stick-on thermometer(just peel and stick) and 2 extra suction cups are provided for spare(total 3).4. Better construction: Adopt 8-slot multi-branched heating wire ceramic frame,better heat dissipation. Cautions:1. The heating part must be fully submerged in the water to avoid dry-burning,otherwise will cause damage to heater.2. Please clean the heater regularly to remove dirt from the heating tube and keep it in good working condition.3. It is forbidden to pull the heater adjustment knob outwards.4. If you need to change the water, please turn off the power, let the heater cool down for more than 20 minutes, wait for it to cool down completely before taking it out. We always keep improving our products and please feel free to contact if you have any questions or suggestions.

name: Aqueon Adjustable Pro Aquarium Heater, 50W
short_description: Adjustable heat setting 68 to 88°F, Electronic Thermostat accurate to +/- 1°
Shatterproof and nearly indestructible
Fully submersible; Auto Shut-Off when over-heats, resets when it cools down
LED light is red when actively heating
For fresh and saltwater aquariums
Includes suction cups for installation and placement
Recommended for aquariums up to 55 Gallons
product_description: Aqueon Pro Aquarium Heaters are built to deliver consistent heat. Each unit is made with a durable thermal plastic shatterproof housing and equipped with an electronic thermostat. The thermostat has an auto shut off safety feature, when the top of the heater tilts below the bottom of the heater, it will shut off. Additional features include adjustable heat settings and LED heating indicator that illuminates when actively heating. The suction cups make horizontal or vertical installation quick and easy. Pro Heaters are fully submersible and made for use in freshwater and saltwater aquariums. Available in five sizes to accommodate various aquarium sizes. Aqueon products offers a wide range of items so that you can build and maintain a healthy aquatic environment. All the essentials from fish tanks, filters, lighting, food, care, and other supplies that your pet fish needs. We make it easy for you to get your first aquarium and to grow in the hobby as you become more of a fish expert with every step you take and every new thing you learn. For those seasoned hobbyists, we are committed to aquarium product innovation so that we continue to offer products that get you excited. With the Aqueon brand, it's all about the fish.

name: 50 Watt Aquarium Heater Submersible Adjustable Temperature Fish Tank Heater 50W
short_description: 【50W DaToo Aquarium Heater】: A suitable temperature is very important for our beloved fish. No suitable temperature, our fish will not survive healthy. How to create this comfortable temperature? DaToo will help you. The DaToo Submersible Aquarium Heater is a system that create a warm and comfortable living environment for your lovely fish. Select DaToo Aquarium Heater, Let us care about your fish starting from the water temperature.

【Adjustable Temperature】: Only need turn the knob on the top of the DaToo fish tank heater, You can easily get the temperature you want（68 to 93°F) and you can read the temperature you set by the dial of the aquarium heater. Perfect Thermostat system to ensure that your beloved fish can be happy and comfortable life. Very Convenient !

【Sturdy And Durable】: Still worried about the heater will be broken?Now let's say goodbye to this worry. The shell of the DaToo Aquarium Heater is made with Shatterproof, Corrosion resistant, Wear-resistant microcrystalline glass(glass-ceramics), can be used in fresh water and salt water.The heating part is made of nickel-chromium alloy, ensure superior heat transfer and enhanced service life. Select DaToo Fish Tank Heater, Let it serve your fish forever.

【BPA Free And Energy Saving】: Every plastic component of the DaToo Fish Tank Heater is made with durable, high-quality, BPA-free plastic. The process of heating does not produce invisible toxins. This means it is safe not only for your fishes, but for you as well. Stepwise heating mode, it will automatically turn on and off to keep your set temperature, reduce electricity consumption. Select DaToo Aquarium Heater, not only care about your fish, but also save electricity fee for you.

【Attention】: This is 50W DaToo Aquarium Heater, 7.6inch, fit 5 to 15 gallons tank with hoods or glass canopies and keep the water flowing. Please make sure that the heater is completely submerged in the water when using it. We provide One Year Warranty. Select DaToo Products= Own A Private Aquarium Housekeeper.

name: hygger 200w Aquarium Heater, Submersible Fish Tank Heater with Intelligent Temperature Control and Leaving Water Automatically Stop Heating System, for 20-40 Gallon Tanks
short_description: 【200W Aquarium Heater】200W aquarium heater is suitable for 20 to 40 gallons of saltwater and freshwater aquariums. Voltage 110-120V, temperature control range 59-93℉ (15-34℃).

【Safety and Durable】The submersible aquarium heater is made of explosion-proof quartz glass material and high-temperature resistant nickel-chromium heating wire, with silicon carbide thermal conductivity, safer heating and longer service life. The sturdy black shell is high-temperature resistant ABS material to protect fish, aquatic life and you from burns.

【Multiple Protections】①Over-temperature protection, it will stop automatically when the set temperature is reached, and it will automatically power off and buzz an alarm when it exceeds 97.7℉. ②Power off when out of water, the heating rod will automatically power off when it leaves the water surface, and the side probe prevents dry burning and fire. ③APS anti-boiling fish system, APS automatically starts when the heating rod is out of control, and automatically cuts off the power within 10 seconds

【Automatic Frequency Power Saving】Automatically reduces power when approaching the set temperature, heating at 10% to 30% power, making full use of thermal inertia to smoothly reach the set temperature and save energy. The external controller is easy to operate, and the set temperature changes by 0.5℉ each time you press it, ranging from 59℉ to a maximum of 93℉ to meet your needs.

【Complete Accessories and Warranty】This aquarium heater comes with the accessories you need. The set includes 1 aquarium heater, 1 controller, 2 suction cups. We provide a 24-month warranty. If there is any problem with our product, please contact us, we are happy to provide you with after-sales service.

name: hygger 300W Aquarium Heater with Controller, Adjustable & Submersible Fish Tank Heater with Digital Display Safety Triple Protection Beeping Alarm for Saltwater and Freshwater 40-80 Gallon
short_description: 300 WATT AQUARIUM HEATERS: 300 watt aquarium heaters are suitable for 40-80 gallon freshwater and saltwater aquariums, turtle tanks and ponds. Heater rod footprint 10.6"x3.3"x1". voltage 110-120V. Power cord from heater rod to controller measures 6.2ft in length. Controller to plug measures 3.9ft in length

SAFETY TRIPLE PROTECTION: If the water temp exceeds 94°F or below 59°F or heater rod dips too low, fish tank heater will automatically shut off the power and stop heating and the display will flash error code and sound beeping alarm to help alert you to the problem, keeping you pet fish healthy in time. Over-temperature protection, low-temperature protection and out of water protection to void cooking fish!

RAPID HEATING AND MAINTAIN AT CONSTANT LEVEL: hygger aquarium heaters are made from dual quartz glass heater tubes and nickel-chromium heating wire which offers durability and outstanding heat conductivity, ensuring rapid heating and maintain a consistent temperature. Plastic casing that protects fish from touching it and burning themselves. It is ideal for use in tanks where large and strong fish or even water turtles are kept

EASY TO SET TEMPERATURE: fully submersible aquarium heater with controller can be easily adjust the temperature setting without getting your hands wet. To set the desired temperature, keeps pushing the set button and it cycle through all the set temperatures. Adjustable temperature between 59°F and 93°F, which means that the fish heater can be used in treating various fish diseases, including white spots

LED DIGITAL DISPLAY: Easy to read digital display showing the current and set temperature which allows you to monitor water temperature at a glance. Red indicator light shows when water is heating and turns into blue that the heater is on standby

name: AquaMiracle 15W Small Aquarium Heater Fish Heater, Super Mini Fish Tank Heater Turtle Tank Heater for 1-3 Gal Tanks, with Dual LED Display, Dry-Run/Overheating Protection & Memory Function
short_description: ULTRA SMALL SIZE - This aquarium heater is incredibly compact, measuring just over half the length of traditional fish heaters! Its innovative design solves the problem of bulky aquarium heaters, taking up less space while still providing powerful heating capabilities.

ACCURATE EXTERNAL THERMOSTAT - The built-in chips ensure precise temperature control with an accuracy of 1F. This is far more precise than the traditional knob-controlled heaters. The digital display on the external thermostat provides 2 readings – the current temperature and the desired temperature - making it incredibly user-friendly.
INVERTER TECHNOLOGY - This fish tank heater uses advanced inverter technology to heat water faster and more efficiently. It maintains a constant temperature and has a longer lifespan.

INTELLIGENT SENSORS - The turtle heater will automatically shut off if the water level is too low (DRY-RUN) or if the water temperature exceeds 97F (OVERHEAT). Additionally, the heater features a MEMORY FUNCTION that retains the last setting in case of a power outage. Say goodbye to the risk of "cooking" your fish!

HIGH-QUALITY MATERIALS - This fish heater is constructed with durable nickel-chromium heating wire and highly heat-conductive sand. It is encased in a shatter-proof quartz glass tube, ensuring exceptional reliability and durability. Silicone protectors on both ends prevent any accidental damage to the fish tank glass.
